analysis.description:
Crowdsale.rate (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#419-421) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#464-475)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#340-347):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#340-341)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#341-343)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#359-369):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#361-363)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#363)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#364-367)

TalaoMarketplace.buy (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#133-141) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#136-140)

TalaoMarketplace.sell (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#148-159) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#151-152)

TalaoMarketplace.withdrawTalao (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#183-197) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#193-197)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#464-475) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#473)

ProgressiveIndividualCappedCrowdsale.getCurrentEthCapPerAddress (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#742-753) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < startGeneralSale (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#745-746)
Crowdsale.rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x1d4ccc31dab6ea20f461d329a0562c1c58412515.sol#419-421)
